book.title: Crit Hit & Run
invariants: No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.

chapters.title: Critical Failure
chapters.goal: Survive the glitchy transmigration into the world of Aethelgard and secure the first 'broken' skill.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a dying human in the real world to a low-level anomaly with a permanent 100% crit-rate glitch.

bridge.from_prev: The protagonist's final moments in a hospital bed.
bridge.to_next: Artie realizes his starting gear cannot handle his massive damage output and will shatter upon the next hit.

chapters.title: The Loot Loop
chapters.goal: Exploit a repeatable tutorial quest to acquire 'Indestructible' tier starter gear.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a fragile glass cannon to a geared-up exploiter capable of surviving basic System Sentinels.

bridge.from_prev: Artie's realization that his glitch breaks standard equipment.
bridge.to_next: The 'Tutorial Completion' trigger alerts the System to an illegal stat distribution.

chapters.title: Aggro Magnet
chapters.goal: Escape the starting zone while being pursued by high-level 'Correction' mobs.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a local anomaly to a regional fugitive with a rising 'System Threat' level.

bridge.from_prev: The System's automated detection of Artie's illegal gear.
bridge.to_next: Artie finds a hidden sanctuary used by other 'glitched' players.

chapters.title: The Dev-Killers
chapters.goal: Investigate the 'Underworld Market' to find a way to mask his glitch from the System's radar.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a lone survivor to a potential member of a revolutionary group of exploiters.

bridge.from_prev: Arrival at the sanctuary of the Dev-Killers.
bridge.to_next: A betrayal within the sanctuary reveals Artie's location to the regional Governor.

chapters.title: Hyper-Inflation
chapters.goal: Execute a high-stakes currency exploit to fund the purchase of a 'Legendary' stealth cloak.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a mere fugitive to an economic terrorist destabilizing the game's core systems.

bridge.from_prev: The need for high-tier stealth to bypass the Governor's gates.
bridge.to_next: The economic collapse triggers an emergency 'World Event' boss spawn.

chapters.title: The Hotfix
chapters.goal: Defeat the System's 'Correction Avatar' before the zone is hard-reset and Artie is deleted.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a threat to the economy to a direct existential threat to the System's control.

bridge.from_prev: The arrival of the Correction Avatar in the middle of the market collapse.
bridge.to_next: The Avatar's defeat leaves a hole in the game's source code.

chapters.title: Unpatched
chapters.goal: Escape through the code-tear into an 'Unmapped' zone to evade the global server reboot.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a hunted glitch to a pioneer in the 'Wild Code' where the System has no power.

bridge.from_prev: The destruction of the Correction Avatar and the temporary suspension of System laws.
bridge.to_next: Artie enters the 'Beta Lands,' where his glitches are the only rules that matter.
